All Codecs ingest and produce Data.

There are a few concepts in Data:

- Data always has a Type
- Data lifetime is managed by the Engine

## Data Types

::: ZL_Type

## Accessors

::: ZL_Input_numElts
::: ZL_Input_eltWidth
::: ZL_Input_contentSize
::: ZL_Input_ptr
::: ZL_Output_ptr
::: ZL_Input_stringLens
::: ZL_Output_stringLens
::: ZL_Output_reserveStringLens
::: ZL_Output_commit
